Title: AI Agents Webinar: Control, Governance, and Accountability
Description: Practical frameworks for governing AI agents, mitigating AI risk, and operationalizing AI with confidence. Co-panelists: Manjit Singh (CEO Druvstar), Josh Devon (CEO Sondera). Moderator: Melissa Aarskug.

Title: What Does It Mean to Be a Developer in the Age of AI Agents?
Description: Panel exploring how AI coding agents reshape software development and whether AI will replace or elevate engineering work. Co-panelists: Joel Confino (Vanguard), Brian O'Neill. Moderator: Grace Francisco.

Title: AMFP Greater Philadelphia Second Annual Healthcare Summit
Description: Panel: Unlocking the Future of Healthcare With AI: A Multi-Disciplinary Approach. Co-panelists: Denis Vaughn (Penn Medicine), Melissa Turner, Emily Downs.

Title: Webinar — AI in Healthcare
Description: Bridging the Gap: Empowering Healthcare Innovation with AI. Presented by Women in Healthcare and Chariot Solutions. Co-speakers: Stacy DiStefano, Emily Downs, Warren Rosebraugh, Melissa Turner.

Title: Things I Wish I Had Known When I Started My First Development Job
Description: Career advice webinar for Zip Code Wilmington development bootcamp students.

Title: Intro to Scala – Fear No More
Description: Introductory Scala workshop covering language fundamentals.

Title: Technical.ly Philly: AI and Coffee Chat - AI Coding Agents
Description: Pre-Thanksgiving gathering on how AI coding agents are transforming our relationship with computers - turning them from tools we use into tools that build tools. Hosted by Christopher Wink. 51 attendees.

Title: Don't Block on It! - Reactive NY Meetup
Description: Techniques for converting blocking code into non-blocking event-driven systems. Covered functional error handling, monad transformers, thread pools, circuit breaker pattern, non-blocking HTTP, and Akka Streams.

Title: Intro to Scala at Philly Tech Week
Description: Introductory Scala workshop at Philly Tech Week covering language fundamentals.
